Text:

2. Install updates
3. Copy everything from Crack folder to the folder where Portal2 installed

after everything is done and set i click on the shortcut, it shows the valve logo and the other logo then it shows a pic from portal and then it says portal2.exe has stop working..... what do i do now
when are uploaders going to learn you don't need to mount the iso file just extract it with winrar.
